name: deep-sea-tooth
effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Attack. Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.
short_effect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Attack. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Huntail.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of CLAMPERL.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of CLAMPERL.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A fang that gleams a sharp silver. It raises the SP. ATK stat.
